mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Wrote him from Albemarle about work here; arrived yesterday for rather short stay; would be glad if he can come immediately; also wants to talk about barn in Albemarle, and a new warehouse he has built at Milton 300 feet long and 12 feet wide of stone.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1812 September 2, Poplar Forest, [Bedford County, Virginia] to Reuben Perry, n.p.
